entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Snow level rising to 1400 metres late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
